title: News24.com | Coronavirus wrap: Turkey sends aid to Italy and Spain, Russia helps US and Europe death toll tops 30 000
description: Turkey has sent health supplies including masks to Italy and Spain, the two European countries worst hit by the novel coronavirus (Covid-19), the defence ministry has said.
content:
Keeping you up to date on the latest novel coronavirus (Covid-19) news
from around the world.
